page.title: 09BROADFORD HOSPITAL page2
page.content: { Continued from page 8...............{ Appendectomy,Stomach operations,Bowel operations and second or later babies.The hospital has to send:First babies,Artificial joints,Bad bone breaks,Ear,nose,throat and eye operations to Raigmore.There are services that the hospital would like to provide but cannot due to lack of funding.The hospital does not want to expand the range of medical facilities but does want better equipment to do a better job. The hospital is situated at Corry,Broadford on a wooded hillside overlooking Broadford Bay.It has the services of two ambulances and has its own helipad.In the case of extreme emergencies an{air-ambulance}service can be operated from the Broadford Airstrip.
